content.name: The Ocean at the End of the Lane

primaryPhoto.description:
To book tickets for THE OCEAN AT THE END OF THE LANE through our friends at ATG Tickets, click here.
‘The National Theatre’s thrilling adaptation of Neil Gaiman’s novel triumphs in the West End’ (Evening Standard). Director Katy Rudd’s ‘knockout production’ (Independent) opened to five-star reviews at the Duke of York’s Theatre and is now heading on a UK tour! Don’t miss this theatrical tour de force of imagination and storytelling.
Returning to his childhood home, a man finds himself standing beside the pond of the old Sussex farmhouse where he used to play. He’s transported to his 12th birthday when his friend Lettie claimed it wasn’t a pond, but an ocean… Plunged into a magical world, their survival depends on their ability to reckon with ancient forces that threaten to destroy everything around them.
Sign up to hear the latest about THE OCEAN AT THE END OF THE LANE theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
